pr_title: refactor(): Edits for sonarCloud critical code smells

timeline.message: refactor(): Edits for sonarCloud critical code smells

timeline.bodyText: I'd like to see this and it's calling method to return Optional<SpringConfigurationPropertySource> since we are explicitly returning null in some cases. If refactoring it now will cause a lot of changes can you put in a TODO?
timeline.author: JakeMathews

replies.bodyText: @JakeMathews to clarify, you'd want fromConfigurableEnvironment to return Optional<List> or List<Optional>?
replies.author: crowleySynopsys

replies.bodyText: I'd want getPropertySource to return Optional<SpringConfigurationPropertySource> since that method could return null.
replies.author: JakeMathews

timeline.bodyText: I'd argue these sample application classes should be removed. @taikuukaits is there value in maintaining these?
timeline.author: JakeMathews

replies.bodyText: Sort of but we can get rid of them. The goal is to eventually make a full detectable library but we might not even end up using these for that.
replies.author: taikuukaits

timeline.bodyText: With this many arguments, perhaps this needs more refactoring than just moving it to another method.
timeline.author: JakeMathews

timeline.bodyText: Does this change the result of toString()?
timeline.author: JakeMathews

timeline.bodyText: Doing this will cause us to iterate over every line multiple times. Yarn.lock files very easily exceed 20k lines. Not sure what the performance impact this will cause, but that's why there was one loop before that would continue if the line didn't matter.
timeline.author: JakeMathews

replies.bodyText: Hmmm so this was the result of some pair refactoring I did with @ekerwin.  We both thought that this refactor was clearer as to what the class is actually doing when it parses, and is cognitively less complex.  The performance concern is justified, though.  Perhaps the impact of that needs to be investigated...
replies.author: crowleySynopsys

replies.bodyText:
I think lower cognitive complexity should be preferred unless performance has been demonstrated to be a problem.
I don't like the method names, 'get' and 'set' should be reserved for getters and setters IMO. Something like filterCleanedLines or findIndexOfFirstLevelZeroLine would be preferred.
replies.author: taikuukaits

replies.bodyText: I agree it's certainly easier to read. But yes I think further investigation is needed.
replies.author: JakeMathews

replies.bodyText: @JakeMathews just tried running Detect on projects with a 20,000+ line yarn.lock file and a 7 line yarn.lock file, respectively, and the run times were 11s and 6s, respectively
replies.author: crowleySynopsys

timeline.bodyText: I think null may mean no user input here. Can you just verify the code calling this isn't expecting a null.
timeline.author: JakeMathews

replies.bodyText: When I looked at usages of AskYesOrNo, the only checks that are done are "if ()" which I feel like actually makes more sense with a boolean returned anyways
replies.author: crowleySynopsys

timeline.author: JakeMathews

replies.bodyText: It wasn't a smell I was looking at, I just changed it when I noticed it on my own so I guess I did it inconsistently.  I'll edit that though
replies.author: crowleySynopsys

timeline.bodyText: This looks like an accidental side effect of the refactor.
timeline.author: JakeMathews

replies.bodyText: ugh, thought I caught all of those.  nice spot
replies.author: crowleySynopsys

timeline.bodyText: If this is returning a ch.qos.logback.classic.Logger why are we using the logger name from slf4j?
timeline.author: JakeMathews

replies.bodyText: the logger type we are using here implements slf4j, and that's where is gets ROOT_LOGGER_NAME from.  sonarCloud had issue with referencing a value from an implemented class that it does not override
replies.author: crowleySynopsys

timeline.message: refactor: Reversed extraction of for loop into a private method
refactor: Changed names of private methods to no longer sound like getters

timeline.author: JakeMathews
JakeMathews

timeline.message: refactor: Reverted DetectorTool and DetectorToolResult to original state
